mean_cn: n. 赌金全赢制，赌金全赢制赛马
mean_en: a type of gambling, often on a horse race, in which people pay a small amount of money and choose a particular horse, team, etc. The person who chooses the winning horse, team, etc. receives all the money paid by everyone else
sentence: I won a sweepstake by betting on a random horse; must be my lucky day!
sentence_trans: 我随便押了一匹马就中了全奖，真是我的幸运日！
